name: Bandana
description: Made from only the finest cotton, this bandana from Alejo Brothers features a double-sided print and sewn edges to guarantee durability.
description_cn: 仅选用最高级的棉材料，这款来自阿莱霍兄弟的围巾采用了双面印花和编织边缘两种工艺用以保证其耐用性.
